channel.title: Astro Sphere
channel.description: Welcome to Astro Sphere, a portfolio and blog for designers and developers.

item.title: Project Three - Enhancing Hermetic Connect
item.description: Expanding the built-in communication application Hermetic Connect on Hermetic OS with encryption and message history storage features.

item.title: Astro Sphere: File Structure
item.description: You'll find these directories and files in the project. What do they do?

item.title: Astro Sphere: Getting Started
item.description: You've downloaded and installed the project. Let's hit the ground running.

item.title: Astro Sphere: Adding a new post or project.
item.description: Adding a new article (blog post or project) is pretty easy.

item.title: Astro Sphere: Writing Markdown
item.description: Basic Markdown syntax that can be used when writing Markdown content in Astro Sphere.

item.title: Astro Sphere: Social media links
item.description: A quick tutorial on how to change, add or remove social media links

item.title: Hermetic OS for Samsung
item.description: Enhanced security and privacy for Samsung devices

item.title: Hermetic OS for Motorola
item.description: Enhanced security and privacy for Motorola devices

item.title: Data Self-Destruction System - Data Oblivion
item.description: Developing a customizable data self-destruction system for Hermetic OS that allows users to instantly and irretrievably erase data from their phone.
